author: wglass
msg: Alow Velocity to be configured with an instance of a resource
loader instead of passing in a class name.  Also added a setter
The upshot is that Velocity is now more friendly to Inversion
of Control (IOC) implementations.  Thanks to Matt Raible for
proposing this and testing it out.
